page.title: 09Woburn Lifestyle 1
page.content: {Hotels and Public Houses As might be expected in a tourist area there is a wide variety of hotels and public houses in the area. The most prestigious is the 4 star Bedford Arms which was originally a Georgian coaching inn and now provides accommodation for businessmen during the week as well as for tourists. While providing a tourist amenity during the day the pubs and hotels are popular with the local population and make Woburn the centre for dining in the area. Most inns and hotels in the area provide food ranging from snacks to full meals and most have gardens or courtyards for summer use. The Birchmore Arms also provides accommodation and has a Sunday disco. Other pubs include the Black Horse - mentioned in the Good Beer Guide, the Bell and The Magpie.
